: : Rodimus Prime : :
He smiled and took Elita into his arms.
Rodimus Prime: Well she is a Transformer, so I'm going to say Energon. I'll go feed her.
Roddy walked with his daughter too the kitchen area, and got a small bottle of liquid Energon, from the dispencer. He lets Elita drink as she pleased.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight/Elita:

"I think so..."said Nightlight "Do you know what a baby eats? I... I 
really  don't know..."
